CustomField.description: If products have start dates or different durations that don't match the opp, check that what's there follow's the intent of the opportunity. The purpose of this is to not have upsell or downsell unnecessarily. For example, if a customer will have one number of seats for the first six months of an opp, and one more seat starting in month 7, there needs to be a start date on a product to show the upsell. They can't all start on day one for a big upsell and then downsell to no products before the subscription end date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If products have start dates or different durations that don't match the opp, check that what's there follow's the intent of the opportunity. The purpose is to not have upsell or downsell unnecessarily. For example, if a customer will have one number of seats for the first six months of an opp, and one more seat starting in month 7, there needs to be a start date on a product to show the upsell. They can't all start on day one for a big upsell and then downsell to no products before the subscription end.
CustomField.label: Product Start Dates Match Intent
